description: Document Viewing REST APIs for Any Platform. Boost your document viewing process to view over 50 document and image formats in any application, using our native document viewer APIs for cloud.
releaseNotes:
GroupDocs.Viewer for Cloud is a REST API for rendering over 50 documents and image formats as HTML5 or Image for the whole document, page by page or custom range of pages. The main features are:
        * Next file formats are supported:
            * Portable Document Format: PDF
            * Microsoft Word: DOC, DOCX, DOCM, DOT, DOTX, DOTM
            * Microsoft Excel: XLS, XLSX, XLSM, XLSB
            * Microsoft PowerPoint: PPT, PPTX, PPS, PPSX
            * Microsoft Visio: VSD, VDX, VSS, VSX, VST, VTX, VSDX, VDW, VSSX, VSTX, VSDM, VSTM, VSSM
            * Microsoft Project: MPP, MPT
            * Microsoft Outlook: MSG, EML
            * Microsoft OneNote: ONE 
            * Apple Mail: EMLX
            * OpenDocument Formats: ODT, OTT, ODS, ODP, OTP, OTS, ODG
            * Rich Text Format: RTF
            * Plain Text File: TXT
            * Comma-Separated Values: CSV
            * HyperText Markup Language: HTML, MHT, MHTML
            * Extensible Markup Language: XML
            * XML Paper Specification: XPS
            * CAD Drawing File Formats: DXF, DWG, IFC, STL
            * Image files: BMP, GIF, JPG, PNG, TIFF, multi-page TIFF, WebP, DjVu, SVG, DNG
            * Electronic publication: EPUB
            * Windows Icon: ICO
            * Mobipocket e-book format: MOBI
            * Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine format: DCM
            * Metafile: WMF, EMF
            * LaTeX: TEX  
        * Flexible rendering documents as HTML5 or Image:
            * Spreadsheet documents rendering:
              * Rendering worksheets with or without grid lines
              * Rendering large worksheets by splitting them into pages 
              * Omitting empty rows when rendering worksheets
            * CAD documents rendering:
              * Rendering specific layout by name
              * Rendering with specified size of scale
            * Text (Microsoft Word) documents rendering:
              * Rendering documents with or without tracked changes
            * PDF documents rendering:
              * Special mode for rendering complex PDF documents 
              * Rendering layers as separate blocks
            * Presentation documents renedering
              * Rendering documents with or without notes 
            * Rotating, reordering and watermarking pages
            * Rendering documents as PDF
            * Rendering document attachments
            * Rendering documents from multiple sources such as URL, request body and storage
            * Rendering documents which uses custom fonts
title: GroupDocs.Viewer Cloud SDK for .NET
